'''Flames of War''' is a [[Support Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. This card can only be created through [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame (Event Card)|Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]] and cannot be included in the deck otherwise.
